title: Agent Identity
description: Canonical representation of an AI agent acting on a WooCommerce store.

agent_id.description: Stable identifier for the agent within the provider's domain.

agent_provider.description: Organization or platform responsible for the agent (e.g. openai, microsoft, custom).

display_name.description: Human-readable name for audit logs and merchant visibility.

acting_for.description: Optional representation of the entity the agent is acting on behalf of.

id.description: Identifier of the user or organization.

capabilities.description: Declared high-level capabilities of the agent. Informational only.

metadata.description: Optional provider-specific metadata. Not used for authorization decisions.
